document_data.mainbody: '''Ulchabh치n M칩r''' was a large [[owlbear]] that prowled the foothills of the [[Storm Horns]] in [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-time}}
document_data.History: The beast was found in the wooded foothills in the mid-1480s DR, enjoyed clawing trees, and had a particular taste for [[venison]].
